info.title: Pixela API Documentation
info.description: API Documentation for Pixela - A platform for tracking and managing your movie and series watching history

get.description: Returns information about the currently authenticated user

post.description: Logs out the current user, revokes all tokens and clears cookies

get.description: Get user's complete favorites list with details for each item

post.description: Add a movie or series to user's favorites list

delete.description: Remove a movie or series from user's favorites list

parameters.name: favorite
parameters.description: ID of the favorite to delete

403.description: Not authorized to delete this favorite

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific movie by its ID
Returns a paginated list of trending movies
Returns a paginated list of top rated movies
Returns a paginated list of discovered movies
Returns a paginated list of movies currently in theaters
Returns a paginated list of movies for a specific genre

200.description: Movies list for the specified genre

get.description: Returns the cast and crew list for a specific movie
Returns videos (trailers, teasers, etc.) associated with a movie
Returns streaming platforms where the movie is available
Returns information about the movie's creator/director
Returns a collection of images associated with the movie (posters, backdrops, etc.)
Returns reviews and ratings associated with the movie
Obtiene todas las reseñas del usuario autenticado

post.description: Crea una nueva reseña para una película o serie

400.description: La reseña ya existe o datos inválidos

403.description: No autorizado para actualizar esta reseña
No autorizado para eliminar esta reseña

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific TV series by its ID
Returns a paginated list of trending TV series
Returns a paginated list of top-rated TV series

get.summary: Get TV series currently on air
get.description: Returns a paginated list of TV series currently airing

200.description: List of TV series currently on air

get.description: Returns a paginated list of discovered TV series
Returns a paginated list of TV series for a specific genre

200.description: List of TV series for the specified genre

get.description: Returns the cast list of a specific TV series
Returns videos (trailers, teasers, etc.) associated with a TV series
Returns streaming platforms where the TV series is available
Returns images associated with a TV series (posters, backdrops, etc.)
Returns reviews and ratings associated with a TV series
Retorna la lista completa de categorías/géneros disponibles en TMDB
Retorna una lista paginada de películas y series que son tendencia

200.description: Lista de contenido trending recuperada exitosamente

get.description: Get the complete list of users (admin only)

put.description: Update an existing user (admin or account owner)

403.description: Not authorized to update this user

delete.description: Delete a user (admin or account owner)

403.description: Not authorized to delete this user

post.description: Send a password reset link to the user's email
Reset user's password using the received token

FavoriteRequest.title: Favorite Request
FavoriteRequest.description: Datos necesarios para añadir un favorito

overview.example: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker...
An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker...

ReviewRequest.description: Data required to create a review

ReviewUpdateRequest.description: Data required to update a review

overview.example: Seven noble families fight for control of the mythical land of Westeros...

ForgotPasswordRequest.description: Request body for password reset link

PasswordResetResponse.description: Response after password reset or reset link sent

UserCreateRequest.description: Request body for creating a user

UserUpdateRequest.description: Request body for updating a user

sanctum.description: Authentication using Laravel Sanctum. Include the token in the Authorization header as 'Bearer {token}'

tags.name: Reviews
tags.description: Operaciones relacionadas con reseñas de películas y series

tags.name: TMDB
tags.description: Operaciones generales de TMDB - categorías y contenido trending
